original: Majjhima Nikāya 151
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Piṇḍapātapārisuddhisutta
analyzed: piṇḍapāta pārisuddhi sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ

original: sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: sāriputtam bhagavān etat avoca

analyzed: vippasannāni kho te sāriputta indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodātaḥ

original: Katamena kho tvaṁ, sāriputta, vihārena etarahi bahulaṁ viharasī”ti?

original: “Suññatāvihārena kho ahaṁ, bhante, etarahi bahulaṁ viharāmī”ti.
analyzed: suññatā vihārena kho aha bhante etarahi bahulam viharāmi iti

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.

original: Mahāpurisavihārena kira tvaṁ, sāriputta, etarahi bahulaṁ viharasi.
analyzed: mahā purisa vihārena kira sāriputta etarahi bahulam viharasi

original: Mahāpurisavihāro eso, sāriputta, yadidaṁ—
analyzed: mahā purisa vihāraḥ esaḥ sāriputta yat idam

original: suññatā.
analyzed: suññatā

analyzed: suññatā vihārena bahulam vihareyyanti tena sāriputta bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabba

original: ‘yena cāhaṁ maggena gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ, yasmiñca padese piṇḍāya acariṁ, yena ca
analyzed: yena ca aham maggena gāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi yasmin ca padese piṇḍāya acari yena ca

original: maggena gāmato piṇḍāya paṭikkamiṁ, atthi nu kho me tattha cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu
analyzed: maggena gāmataḥ piṇḍāya paṭikkami atthi nu kho me tattha cakkhu viññeyyesu rūpesu

original: Sace pana, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:

original: ‘bhāvitā kho me satta bojjhaṅgā’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: bhāvitā kho me satta bojjhaṅgā ti tena sāriputta bhikkhunā tena iva pīti pāmojjena vihātabbam ahoratta anusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabba

original: ‘bhāvito nu kho me ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’ti?
analyzed: bhāvitaḥ nu kho me ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo ti

original: Sace, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘abhāvito kho me ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: a bhāvitaḥ kho me ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo ti tena sāriputta bhikkhunā ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanāya vā āyamitabba

original: Sace pana, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace pana sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘bhāvito kho me ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: bhāvitaḥ kho me ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo ti tena sāriputta bhikkhunā tena iva pīti pāmojjena vihātabbam ahoratta anusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabba

original: ‘bhāvitā nu kho me samatho ca vipassanā cā’ti?
analyzed: bhāvitā nu kho me samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca ati

original: Sace, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘abhāvitā kho me samatho ca vipassanā cā’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā samathavipassanānaṁ bhāvanāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: a bhāvitā kho me samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca ati tena sāriputta bhikkhunā samatha vipassanānam bhāvanāya

original: Sace pana, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace pana sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘bhāvitā kho me samatho ca vipassanā cā’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: bhāvitā kho me samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca ati tena sāriputta bhikkhunā tena iva pīti pāmojjena vihātabbam ahoratta anusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabba

original: ‘sacchikatā nu kho me vijjā ca vimutti cā’ti?
analyzed: sacchikatā nu kho me vijjā ca vimutti ca ati

original: Sace, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘asacchikatā kho me vijjā ca vimutti cā’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā vijjāya vimuttiyā sacchikiriyāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: a sacchikatā kho me vijjā ca vimutti ca ati tena sāriputta bhikkhunā vijjāya vimuttiyā sacchikiriyāya vā āyamitabba

original: Sace pana, sāriputta, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: sace pana sāriputta bhikkhu paccavekkhamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘sacchikatā kho me vijjā ca vimutti cā’ti, tena, sāriputta, bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: sacchikatā kho me vijjā ca vimutti ca ati tena sāriputta bhikkhunā tena iva pīti pāmojjena vihātabbam ahoratta anusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu

original: Ye hi keci, sāriputta, atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhesuṁ, sabbe te evameva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhesuṁ.
analyzed: ye hi keci sāriputta atītam addhānam samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā piṇḍapātam parisodhesu sabbe te evam eva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātam parisodhesu

original: Yepi hi keci, sāriputta, anāgatamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhessanti, sabbe te evameva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhessanti.
analyzed: ye api hi keci sāriputta anāgatam addhānam samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā piṇḍapātam parisodhessanti sabbe te evam eva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātam parisodhessanti

original: Yepi hi keci, sāriputta, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhenti, sabbe te evameva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhenti.
analyzed: ye api hi keci sāriputta etarahi samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā piṇḍapātam parisodhenti sabbe te evam eva paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātam parisodhenti

original: Tasmātiha, sāriputta, ‘paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātaṁ parisodhessāmā’ti—
analyzed: tasmā ati ha sāriputta paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā piṇḍapātam parisodhessāma ati

original: evañhi vo, sāriputta, sikkhitabban”ti.
analyzed: evam hi vaḥ sāriputta sikkhitabbanti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: piṇḍapātapārisuddhi suttam niṭṭhitam navama
